DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety efficacy single session low-fluence panretinal photocoagulation compare full-fluence PRP . Hypothesis : single-session low-fluence PRP safe regard progression macular edema presence adverse event , efficiently induce regression neovascularization .
DOC.criteria: Type 1 type 2 diabetic Proliferative diabetic retinopathy Previous treatment PRP Media opacities Previous treatment macular edema ( LASER intravitreal injection ) Recent ( less 6 month ) ophthalmic surgery Only eye Intraretinal subretinal fluid foveal involvement Chronic renal failure History liver pancreatic transplant
